data.title: gl test instance
data.description: echarts-gl 测试实例,参考pissang gl例子
data.code:
var canvas = document.createElement('canvas');
var myImage = echarts.init(canvas, null, {
    width: 1000,
    height: 800
});

            globe: {
                globeRadius:50,
                // globeOuterRadius:50,
                baseTexture: myImage,
                // heightTexture: "/asset/get/s/data-1491889019097-rJQYikcpl.jpg",
